prod_short_desc: Bite back against Killer Croc™ with the Bat-Tank!
prod_long_desc:
Roll the Bat-Tank into action and fire the 6-stud shooter against Killer Croc's Battle Chomper. Drop bombs from the tank or deploy the ram weapon to crush Batman's enemies. Maneuver the motorbike out of reach of the Battle Chomper's movable tail and chomping teeth, and dodge the vehicle's flying boomerangs. Includes 4 minifigures.
Build Batman’s armored Bat-Tank and use its deployable ram, stud-shooter and rolling treads to smash Killer Croc’s reptilian Battle Chomper!
Killer Croc vehicle has chomping jaws, moving tail, and a lookout tower with boomerang shooter for Captain Boomerang!
Includes minifigures of Batman, Red Hood, Katana, and Captain Boomerang, plus Killer Croc big figure
DC Comics Super Heroes building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Bat-Tank is over 3” high, 11” long, and 6” wide. Killer Croc’s Battle Chomper is over 3” high, 10” long, and 6” wide
759 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14
